QuestData.Title: Tanaris is Calling
QuestData.Description: Heya, $n, Megs Dreadshredder down in Tanaris left a message for you. She says that the goblins down there in Gadgetzan heard about what you've been doing up here.$B$BAnyway, the Cataclysm hit them hard, too. Not as hard as us, but I'm certain they could use your help.$B$BBesides, that Megs is a hottie!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Megs Dreadshredder at Gadgetzan in Tanaris.
QuestData.RewardText: Well hello there, $c. Welcome to Tanaris!
